languages.text: "Звезда прямо по курсу — родное светило этой системы. Люминочтец сообщает, что структура солнца была... изменена".
"The star right ahead of us is native to this system. The lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."
languages.original_text: "Звезда прямо по курсу — родное светило этой системы. Люминочтец сообщает, что структура солнца была... изменена".

traits.locale_text: "The star right ahead of us is native to this system. A lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."
"The star right ahead of us is native to this system. A lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."
"The star right ahead of us is native to this system. The lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."
"The star right ahead of us is native to this system. The lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."
"The star right ahead of us is native to this system. The lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."

languages.text: “我们面前的恒星是这个星系的原生恒星。观星者报告说，它的结构遭到了……改变。”
languages.original_text: "The star right ahead of us is native to this system. The lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."

traits.locale_text: “我们面前的恒星是这个星系的原生恒星。观星者报告说，它的结构遭到了……改变。”

languages.text: « L'étoile qui se trouve juste devant nous est originaire de ce système. Le lumenomaître indique que sa structure a été... altérée. »
languages.original_text: "The star right ahead of us is native to this system. The lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."

traits.locale_text: « L'étoile qui se trouve juste devant nous est originaire de ce système. Le lumenomaître indique que sa structure a été... altérée. »

languages.text: "Der Stern vor uns ist beheimatet in diesem System. Der Lumenoleser berichtet, dass seine Struktur ... Veränderungen aufweist."
languages.original_text: "The star right ahead of us is native to this system. The lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."

traits.locale_text: "Der Stern vor uns ist beheimatet in diesem System. Der Lumenoleser berichtet, dass seine Struktur ... Veränderungen aufweist."

languages.text: «La estrella que tenemos delante es nativa de este sistema. El fotometrista informa de que esta estructura ha sido... alterada».
languages.original_text: "The star right ahead of us is native to this system. The lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."

traits.locale_text: «La estrella que tenemos delante es nativa de este sistema. El fotometrista informa de que esta estructura ha sido... alterada».

languages.text: 「前方の星はこの星系に属する。ルメノリーダーの報告によると…構造が変化している」
languages.original_text: "The star right ahead of us is native to this system. The lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."

traits.locale_text: 「前方の星はこの星系に属する。ルメノリーダーの報告によると…構造が変化している」

languages.text: "Önümüzdeki yıldız, bu sisteme ait. Lümenölçerin bildirdiğine göre yapısı... Değiştirilmiş."
languages.original_text: "The star right ahead of us is native to this system. The lumenoreader reports that its structure has been... altered."
